title: hashinshin is barely even a man.
body:
Actually, I want to bleach my eyes after seeing his two incher.

LMAO.

replies.body:
Personal (and potentially other class of) insults aside, I'm more curious to hear the story about how and why you've gone out of your way to go and see his junk.

I'm guessing that OP must be madly in love with the subject in question, and just both in denial but also attacking them possibly with the passive/secret goal of trying to get noticed by their beloved senpai. That must be it!

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=w33ZfaTi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-05T09:49:46.624+0000)
>
> Personal (and potentially other class of) insults aside, I'm more curious to hear the story about how and why you've gone out of your way to go and see his junk.
> 
> I'm guessing that OP must be madly in love with the subject in question, and just both in denial but also attacking them possibly with the passive/secret goal of trying to get noticed by their beloved senpai. That must be it!

Ohohohoh you got me! It's all over now, guys!

Super top laner

"Fucking jungler wont gank 3 mins in and _calls_ _me bad_? !" hashinshin dies 1v1 in the first 2 minutes into the game, then tps back in to feed some more.

"Is this guy inting" Cheesyleeks has been banned from chat.
